m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Toyota Research Institute Pushes Towards Autonomous Future April 27th, 2016 by Kyle Field   Toyota Research Institute Founded — November 2015 In November, Toyota announced a bold new strategy for the company when it shared plans to invest a mammoth $1 billion into the newly founded Toyota Research Institute (TRI). The institute was commissioned to address 3 specific areas related to not just automotive applications (as one would expect) but rather, artificial intelligence for life in general.
